title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.4 - Adjournments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.4 - Adjournments

State Regulations

Applications for adjournments shall not be granted except
for good cause and unless written request is presented therefor. No request for
adjournment shall be considered granted until such time as the same has been
approved by the hearing commissioner in charge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
52.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
